item.title: Number Theory Primer
item.author: aschanna123@gmail.com (Avneet Singh)
item.description: A beginner friendly explaination of some select algorithms in number theory. This is, by no means, a complete/detailed post. For more information on these algorithms, consult a reliable source like Wikipedia. Greatest Common Divisor GCD (also called HCF) finds common divisors of 2 numbers. Shortcut -> $ gcd(a,b) = gcd(a\%b, b) $. The following is an implementation of Euclidean Algorithm. def gcd(x, y): '''finds GCD of 2 positive integers''' while y: y, x = x % y, y return x # Or simply do -> # from math import gcd # result = gcd(25, 15) We use divison lemma $a = bq+r$.
